page.title: 01Polperro village Lansallos
page.content: The whole of the area is dominated by the village and harbour of Polperro. It is visited by tens of thousands of tourists during the summer and the whole of life is governed by this influx. The harbour still has a fishing industry but many of the smaller boats cater for the tourist trade rather than the commercial markets. The majority of the buildings around the village centre,harbour and main streets are associated with tourism,ie.,shops, restaraunts and holiday accommodation,and thus property prices are very high.The streets are closed to holiday traffic during the summer,but there is a large car park at the entrance to the village.
